mapper.select: SELECT P1.*,P2.TOTAL,P3.FINISH,P4.UN_FINISH,P5.WORK_HOUR,P6.THIS_WEEK_COUNT,S1.REAL_NAME FROM project_info P1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROJECT_ID,COUNT(1) AS TOTAL FROM project_task GROUP BY PROJECT_ID ) P2 ON P1.ID = P2.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROJECT_ID,COUNT(1) AS FINISH FROM project_task WHERE STATUS = 2 GROUP BY PROJECT_ID ) P3 ON P1.ID = P3.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROJECT_ID,COUNT(1) AS UN_FINISH FROM project_task WHERE (STATUS = 0 OR STATUS = 1 OR STATUS = 3) GROUP BY PROJECT_ID ) P4 ON P1.ID = P4.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.PROJECT_ID,SUM(WORK_HOUR) AS WORK_HOUR FROM project_task_process t1 JOIN project_task t2 on t1.task_id = t2.id GROUP BY PROJECT_ID ) P5 ON P1.ID = P5.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROJECT_ID,COUNT(1) AS THIS_WEEK_COUNT FROM project_task where STATUS = 2 and REAL_END_TIME >= CONCAT(#{beginDate},' 00:00:00') and REAL_END_TIME <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY PROJECT_ID ) P6 ON P1.ID = P6.PROJECT_ID JOIN SYS_USER S1 ON P1.RESPONSER = S1.ID ORDER BY WORK_HOUR DESC
